definition: to cry out/to bark out a sound
to shout/to call/to order/to ask/to be called/by (indicates agent in the passive mood)

sentences.english: It was my neighbor’s wife! I rushed in without hesitation.
sentences.chinese: 原来是我邻居的妻子在叫唤，我毫不犹豫的冲了过去。

sentences.english: Jim was so engrossed in his computer games that he did not hear his mother call.
sentences.chinese: 吉姆埋头玩电脑游戏，一点都没有听到母亲的叫唤声。

sentences.english: The Bian city king occupies just northern fertile burnt stone under of yell the earth jail.
sentences.chinese: 卞城王占据正北方沃焦石下的叫唤大地狱。

sentences.english: And the first cuckoo's melancholy cry.
sentences.chinese: 还有那杜鹃的第一声忧郁叫唤。

sentences.english: A fat gray cat rubs against her leg. It meows.
sentences.chinese: 一只肥大的灰猫讨好地抓她的腿，喵喵地叫唤着。

sentences.english: I called, I shouted for my brother but he didn't answer.
sentences.chinese: 我大声叫唤着我的兄弟，但他没有回答。

sentences.english: The sun rose to the mid sky and doves cooed in the shade.
sentences.chinese: 太阳升到中天，鸽子在凉荫中叫唤。

sentences.english: And from the wood-top calls the crow, through all the gloomy day.
sentences.chinese: 灌木飞出松鸦，乌鸦在树冠上叫唤。

sentences.english: Each call has an animal's unique vocal stamp on it.
sentences.chinese: 每一声叫唤都带有一个动物独特的声音印章。

sentences.english: Suddenly, Mother calling me perked my ears.
sentences.chinese: 突然，母亲的叫唤传进我的耳中。

sentences.english: But several were now screaming to him.
sentences.chinese: 但很多声音在他脑海里叫唤着。

sentences.english: The Bian metropolis king occupies just northern fertile burnt stone under of scream the earth jail.
sentences.chinese: 卞城王占据正北方沃焦石下的叫唤大地狱。

sentences.english: When an elder is asking for someone, I will get that person for him ringt away.
sentences.chinese: 如长者在叫唤人，要立即代长者去叫。

sentences.english: "Please, " the voice called, "won't you help me?
sentences.chinese: “行行好心”一个声音在叫唤，“你能帮帮我吗？”

sentences.english: The bed is uploaded a complaint, "BE imagining, wail what."
sentences.chinese: 床上传来一声抱怨，“正做梦呢，叫唤什么。”

sentences.english: The hogs loafed and grunted around everywheres.
sentences.chinese: 猪到处走动，嘴里咕噜咕噜叫唤着。

definition: yelling (sound made by person)/barking/braying/roaring (sound made by animals)
to cry out loud without tears
to whinny (of a horse)/to neigh/to shout
to argue noisily/to shout/to make widely known/to reproach
to shout and quarrel/to make a big fuss
